https://tmrev.io/movie/657478-Cerro Rico: The Mountain That Eats Men 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null "The gates of hell" was how a Bolivian mountain rich in silver became known. Four hundred years on, life remains just as bad for the men and women who scrape a living from its toxic seams. Cerro Rico: The Mountain That Eats Men
